Translations.Text: avaru, a parama dayaluvina kadeyinda tam'ma balige banda pratiyondu upadesavannu sampurna kadeganisuttare
hige avaru (satyavannu) sullendu tiraskarisi bittiddare. Avaru geli maduttidda vastavavu (sikseyu) bahu begane avara balige bandu biduvudu
avarenu, bhumiyannu noduvudillave? Navu adarolage estondu bageya srestha sasyavargagalannu belesiruvevu
idaralli khandita purave ide. Adare avaralli heccinavaru nambuvavaralla
nim'ma odeyanu khandita prabalanu karunaluvu agiddane
nim'ma odeyanu musarannu karedu helidanu; akrami janangada balige hogiri
Phir‌aunana janangada balige. Avarenu anjuvudillave
avaru (musa) helidaru; nannodeya, avaru nannannu tiraskarisuvaremba bhaya nanagide
nanna manas'su kugguttide. Nanna nalige calisuttilla. Ninu (i honeyannu) harunaredege kalisu
avara bali nanna virud'dha ondu aropavide. Addarinda avaru nannannu kolluvaremba atanka nanagide
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; khandita hagagadu. Idiga nivibbaru nam'ma puravegalondige hogiri. Navu ellavannu keluvavaragi nim'ma jotege iruvevu
nivibbaru phir‌aunana balige hogi heliri; navu ella jagattugala odeyana dutaru
ninu isra'ilara santatiyannu nam'ma jote kalisi bidu
avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; navu ninna balyadalli ninnannu nam'ma naduve posisiralillave mattu ninna badukina halavu varsagalannu ninu nam'ma jotege kalediralillave
adaru ninu a ninna krtyavannu madibitte. Ninu khandita krtaghnanu
avaru (musa) helidaru; nanu ajnanada sthitiyalli a krtyavannu esagidde
a balika nanu nimage anji nim'ma baliyinda odi hode. A balika nanna odeyanu nanage honegarikeyannu nididanu mattu nannannu dutanagi nemisidanu
innu, ninu nanna mele rna horisuva a upakaragalu. Nijavagi, ninu isra'ilara santatiyannu dasyakke olapadisiruve
phir‌aunanu kelidanu; ella lokagala odeya andare enadu
avaru (musa) helidaru; avanu akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanu. Nivu nambuvavaragiddare (cennagittu)
avanu (phir‌aun) tanna akkapakkadavarodane kelidanu; nivu keluttillave
avaru (musa) helidaru; avanu nim'ma odeyanu haudu, nim'ma hindina nim'ma tata muttatandira odeyanu haudu
avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; nim'ma kadege kalisalagiruva i nim'ma devadutanu huccane sari
Avaru (musa) helidaru; avanu purvada hagu pascimada hagu averadara naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanu. Nivu bud'dhi ullavaragiddare (cennagittu)
avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; ninu nanna horatu bere yarannadaru devaragisikondare nanu khandita ninnannu kaidigala salige serisuvenu
avaru (musa) helidaru; nanu ninna balige ondu spasta puraveyannu tandaru? (Hage maduveya)
avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; ninu satyavantanagiddare adannu tandu bidu
aga avaru (musa) tam'ma urugolannu kelakke esedu bittaru mattu hathattane adu spastavagi ondu hebbavina rupa talitu
mattu avaru tam'ma kaiyannu hora tegedaga, noduvavara munde adu ujvalavagi holeyuttittu
avanu (phir‌aun) tanna akka pakka idda saradararodane helidanu; avanu khandita obba tajna mantrikanu
avanu tanna jaduvina mulaka nim'mannu nim'ma nadininda horadabba bayasuttane. Nivenu sucisuttiri
avaru (asthanigaru) helidaru; avanige hagu avana sahodaranige kalavakasa kodiri mattu janarannu ottu serisuvavarannu vividha nagaragalige ravanisiri
avaru, ella parinata jadugararannu nim'ma balige tarali
hige, ondu niscita dina, nirdista samayadalli jadugararella ottu seridaru
janarodane helalayitu; nivu ottu seriruvira
jadugararu vijayigaladare navella avaranne anusarisona
jadugararella bandu seridaga avaru phir‌aunanodane kelidaru; navu geddare namage bahumanavenadaru sikkite
avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; haudu, aga nivu nanna aptara salige seruviri
avarodane (jadugararodane) musa, ‘‘nivu eseya bayasuvudannu esedu bidiri’’ endaru
avaru, tam'ma haggagalannu dandagalannu esedaru mattu ‘‘phir‌aunana gauravadane! Navu khandita gelluvevu’’ endaru
Konege musa tam'ma urugolannu esedaru. Adu avara (jadugarara) ella krtaka srstigalannu nungatodagitu
astaralle jadugararella sastangaveragibittaru
avaru helidaru; navu nambidevu, sarvalokagala odeyanannu
musa mattu harunara odeyanannu

avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; nanu nimage anumati niduva munnave nivu avanannu nambi bittiri. Avane (musa) nimage jadu kalisida nim'ma maha nayakanagirabeku. Nimage bahubegane tiliyalide. Nanu khandita nim'ma kaigalannu kalugalannu virud'dha dikkugalinda kadidu hakuvenu mattu nim'mellarannu silubegerisi biduvenu
avaru helidaru; paravagilla. Navantu nam'ma odeyana kadege marali hoguvavaru
navu, (satyavannu) nambidavaralli modaligaraddarinda nam'modeyanu nam'ma tappugalannella khandita ksamisi biduvanendu niriksisutteve
mattu (munde) navu musarige divyavaniyannu kalisidevu; nanna dasarondige horatu bidi. Nim'mannu khandita himbalisalaguvudu
phir‌aunanu (i sandesadondige) ella nagaragalige suddigararannu ravanisidanu
‘‘avaru (isra'ilara santati) kevala ondu sanna pangada matravagiddare
avaru nam'mannu bahalastu keralisiddare
navu ondu jagrta padeyagiddeve’’
konege navu avarannu horagattibittevu, totagalinda hagu jharigalinda
bokkasagalinda hagu pratisthita bhavanagalinda
i riti, navu isra'ilara santatiyannu avara uttaradhikarigalagisidevu
suryodayada hottige avaru (phir‌aunana padegalu) avarannu (musarannu) himbalisidaru
eradu tandagalu paraspararannu kandaga musara jotegararu helidaru; navu sikki biddevu
avaru (musa) helidaru; khandita illa. Nanna jote nanna odeyaniddane. Avanu khandita nanage dari toruttane
Navu musarige, ‘‘nim'ma urugolininda kadalige hodeyiri’’ endu divyavaniyannu kalisidevu. (Avaru hodedaga,) adu (samudravu) ibbhagavagi bittitu mattu pratiyondu bhagavu ondu brhat parvatadantittu
mattu navu innondu gumpannu (phir‌aunana padeyannu) adara balige tandevu
konege navu musarannu hagu avara jotegidda ellarannu raksisidevu
mattu innondu gumpannu navu mulugisi bittevu
idaralli khandita pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambuvavaragiralilla
mattu (dutare,) nim'ma odeyanu khandita, prabalanu hagu karunaluvagiddane
nivu avarige ibrahimara vrttantavannu odi kelisiri
avaru tam'ma tandeyodane hagu tam'ma janangadavarodane, ‘‘nivu idenannu pujisuttiruviri?’’ Endu kelidaru
avaru helidaru; navu murtigalannu pujisutteve mattu navu sada avarige nistharagirutteve
avaru (ibrahim) kelidaru; nivu prarthisuvaga avugalu nim'ma prarthaneyannu keluttaveye
athava avu nimagenadaru labhavannuntu maduttaveye? Athava avu nimagenadaru nasta untu madaballave
avaru (janaru) helidaru; nijavagi nam'ma tata muttatandiru higeye maduttiddudannu navu kandirutteve
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nivu pujisuttiruvudu enannu embudannu nivu nodidira
hageye, nivu mattu nim'ma gatakalada tata muttatandiru pujisuttiddudu (enembudannu nodiruvira)
avarellaru khandita nanna satrugalu. Sarva lokagala odeyana horatu
avane nannannu srstisidavanu mattu nanage saridari toruvavanu
avane nanage tinisuvavanu hagu kudisuvavanu
nanu rogiyadaga avane nannannu gunapadisuvavanu
avane nanage marana niduvavanu mattu nannannu (matte) jivanta golisuvavanu
(Antima) pratiphalada dina nanna tappugalannu avane ksamisuvanendu nanu niriksisuttene
nannodeya, nanage janmeyannu nidu mattu nannannu sajjanara salige serisu
mundina janaralli nanna uttama prastapavannu munduvarisu
ninu nannannu anugrahagalu tumbida svargada uttaradhikariyagisu
nanna tandeyannu ksamisibidu. Avaru khandita, darigettavara salige seriddaru
ellarannu matte jivantagolisalaguva dina, nannannu apamanisabeda
adu, sampattinindagali, santanagalindagali yarigu labhavagada dinavagiruvudu
nirmala manas'sinondige allahana balige bandavanu matra (andu suraksitanagiruvanu)
andu svargavannu dharmanistharige hattiragolisalaguvudu
mattu narakavannu darigettavara munde taralaguvudu
(andu) avarodane kelalaguvudu; nivu yarannella pojisuttiddiro avarella elliddare
allahana horatu. Indu avaru nimage neravagaballare? Athava avaru svatah tamage tave neravagaballare
avarannu darigettavarannu mukha kelagagisi adarolage (narakadolage) haki bidalaguvudu
saitanana padeya ellarigu (ide gati odaguvudu)
adaralli avaru paraspara jagaladutta heluvaru
allahanane! Navantu spastavagi darigettiddevu –
– ella lokagala odeyanige sarisatigaliddare endu navu helidaga
nam'mannu darigedisidavaru khandita aparadhigalu
(indu) nam'ma paravagi sipharasu maduvavaru yaru illa
(namagindu) naija mitranobbanu illa
namage innondu avakasa sikkiddare navu khandita nambidavaragiruttiddevu
idaralli khandita pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambuvavaragiralilla
mattu nim'modeyanu khandita, prabala hagu karunamayiyagiddane
nuhara janangadavaru (halavu) dutarannu tiraskarisidaru
avara sahodara nuharu avarodane helidaru; nivenu anjuvudillave
Nanu nim'medege bandiruva nambalar'ha dutanagiddene
nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
nanu idakkagi nim'minda pratiphalavannenu apeksisuttilla. Nanage pratiphala nidabekadavanu ella lokagala odeyanu matra
nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
avaru (nadinavaru) helidaru; nim'mannu anusarisuttiruvavaru kilu vargadavaru. Higirutta navu nim'mannu nambabeke
avaru (nuh) helidaru; avara kasubugala kuritu nanage tiliyadu
avara vicaraneya hone iruvudu nanna odeyanige matra. Nimage idara arividdiddare cennagittu
nanantu visvasigalannu dura odisalare
nanu kevala eccarisuvavane horatu berenu alla
avaru (nadinavaru) helidaru; o nuh, ninu (idannella) nillisadiddare khandita, ninnannu kallesedu kollalaguvudu
avaru (nuh) helidaru; nannodeya, nanna janangadavaru nannannu tiraskarisiddare
ninu nanna hagu avara naduve ondu spasta tirmana madibidu mattu nannannu nanna jotegiruva visvasigalannu raksisu
konege, navu avarannu, tumbida hadaginalli avara jotagiddavarannu raksisidevu
a balika navu itararannu mulugisi bittevu
khanditavagiyu idaralli pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambuvavaragiralilla
nim'modeyanu prabalanu karunamayiyu agiddane
ad janangadavaru (halavu) dutarannu tiraskarisiddaru
avarodane avara sahodara hud heliddaru; nivenu anjuvudillave
nanu nim'medege bandiruva nambalar'ha devadutanagiddene
nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
idakkagi nanu nim'minda pratiphalavannenu keluttilla. Nanna pratiphalavantu ella lokagala odeyana baliyalle ide
nivenu, kevala vyartha mojigagi pratiyondu ettarada sthaladallu ondu smarakavannu nirmisuttira
Mattu ille sasvatavagi iralikkagi nivu bhavya bhavanagalannu nirmisuttira
mattu nivu akramisuvaga bahala krurigalagi akramisuttiri
(idannella bittu) niviga allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
nimage tilidiruva vastugala mulaka nimage neravadavanige anjiri
avanu nimage neravagiruvanu, januvarugala mulaka hagu santatigala mulaka
totagala hagu cilumegala mulaka
nivu ondu mahadinada siksege guriyaguviremba bhaya nanagide
avaru (janangadavaru) helidaru; nam'ma mattige nivu bodhisidaru onde, bodhisade iddaru onde
avella kevala gatakaladavara acaragalu
navu yava siksegu guriyagalarevu
hige, avaru avarannu (hud‌rannu) tiraskarisidaru mattu navu avarannu (hud‌ra janangadavarannu) nasamadidevu. Idaralli khandita pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambuvavaragiralilla
nim'ma odeyanu khandita prabalanu karunaluvu agiddane
samud janangadavaru (halavu) dutarannu tiraskarisiddaru
avara sahodara salih, avarodane helidaru; nivenu anjuvudillave
nanu nim'medege bandiruva, nambalar'hanada devadutanagiddene
nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
nanu idakkagi nim'minda pratiphalavannenu apeksisuttilla. Nanna pratiphalavu ella lokagala odeyana bali matravide
nim'mannenu ille sada niscintaragiralu bittu bidalaguvude
i udyanagalalli hagu cilumegalalli
i holagalalli hagu naya najukina kharjurada goncalugaliruva holagalalli
nivu parvatagalannu koredu manegalannu nirmisi sambhrama paduttiri
allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
nivu atikramigala adesagalannu anusarisabedi
avaru bhumiyalli asanti habbuvavare horatu yavude sudharaneya kelasa maduvavaralla
Avaru (janangadavaru) helidaru; nivu obba matapidita vyaktiyagiruviri
nivu kevala nam'mantaha obba manusya matra. Nivu nijakku satyavantaragiddare enadaru purave tanniri
avaru (salih) helidaru; i hennonte. Idu niru kudiyuvudakke mattu nivu niru kudiyuvudakke (pratyeka) dina nigadiyagiruttade
nivu ketta sankalpadondige idannu muttabedi. Muttidare nivu ondu maha dinada siksege guriyaguviri
avaru adannu kadidu bittaru mattu a balika bahalastu pascattapa pattaru
konege sikseyu avarannu avarisitu. Idaralli pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambiralilla
khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyanu bahala prabalanu karunaluvu agiddane
lut‌ra janangadavaru (halavu) dutarannu tiraskarisidaru
avara sahodara lut, avarodane helidaru; nivenu anjuvudillave
nanu nim'ma palige nambalar'ha dutanagiddene
nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
nanu idakkagi nim'minda pratiphalavannenu keluttilla. Nanna pratiphalaviruvudu ella lokagala odeyana bali matra
sarva jagattinalli nivu matra (kamakkagi) purusara balige hoguttira
mattu nivu nimagagi allahanu srstisiruva nim'ma patniyarannu bittu biduttira? Nijavagi, nivu atikramigalagiruviri
avaru (janaru) helidaru; nivu (nim'ma upadesavannu) nillisadiddare nim'mannu (nadininda) hora hakalaguvudu
avaru (lut) helidaru; nim'ma krtya (salingakama)da bagge nanage jigupse ide
nannodeya, nannannu, nanna palayavarannu, avara krtyagalinda raksisu
konege navu avarannu avara palayada ellarannu raksisidevu
hinde ulidukonda obba vrddeya horatu
a balika navu itarellarannu nasa madibittevu
Navu avara mele (kallina) maleyannu surisidevu. Eccarisalagiddavara palige adu bahala ketta maleyagittu
idaralli khandita pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambuvavaragiralilla
nim'ma odeyanantu tumba prabalanu karunaluvu agiddane
‘aikah’davaru (halavu) dutarannu tiraskarisidaru
avarodane (duta) su'aib helidaru; nivenu anjuvudillave
nanu nim'ma palige nambalar'ha dutanagiruvenu
nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nannannu anusarisiri
nanu idakkagi nim'minda pratiphalavannenu keluttilla. Nanna pratiphalaviruvudu ella lokagala odeyana bali matra
purnavagi alatemadiri mattu alateyalli kaditagolisabedi
neravagiruva takkadiyalle tugiri
janarige avara vastugalannu kaditagolisi kodabedi mattu bhumiyalli asantiyannu habbutta tirugabedi
mattu nivu, nim'mannu hagu nimaginta modalinavarannu srstisidavanige anjiri
avaru helidaru; ninu khandita matapiditanagiruve
ninu nam'mantaha obba manusya matra. Navu ninnannu sullugaranendu bhavisutteve
ninu nijakku satyavantanagiddare nam'ma mele akasada ondu tundannu bilisu
avaru (su'aib) helidaru; nannodeya, avarenu maduttiruvarembudu ninage tilidide
avaru (aikahdavaru) avarannu (su'aib‌rannu) tiraskarisidaru. Konege neralina dinada sikseyu avarannu avarisikonditu. Adu nijakku ondu maha dinada sikseyagittu
idaralli khandita pathavide. Avaralli heccinavaru nambiralilla
mattu khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyanu atyanta prabalanu karunamayiyu agiddane
idu (kur‌an) ella lokagala odeyanindale ilisalpattide
nambalar'hanada atmanu (jibril) idannu hottu ilidiruvanu –
– nim'ma (dutara) manada mele, nivu eccarisuvavaragabekendu –
– spastavada arabi bhaseyalli
Khanditavagiyu idu (i mahiti) gatakaladavara granthagalallu ide
idannella isra'ilara santatiya vidvansaru ballaru embudu avara palige ondu puraveyallave
ondu vele navu idannu arabarallada yarigadaru ilisikottiddare
mattu atanu avarige adannu odi kelisiddare, agalu avaru idannu nambuttiralilla
i riti navu adannu (nirakaraneyannu) aparadhigala manas'sugalolage nati bittiruvevu
nijavagi avaru, yatanamaya sikseyannu kanuvavaregu idannu nambalararu
adu (a sikseyu) hathattane avara mele banderaguvudu mattu avarige adara arivu iralaradu
aga avaru, namage ondistu kalavakasa sikkite? Endu keluvaru
avarenu, nam'ma siksegagi atura paduttiruvare
nivu kandira? Navu avarannu sukhabhogadalliralu varsagattale avakasa nididare
mattu a balika, avarige enannu vagdana madalagitto adu (sikseyu) bandubittare
avaru bhogisuttidda vastugalinda avarige yava labhavu agadu
eccarisuvavarannu kalisade navu yavude nadannu nasamadilla
idu upadesa. Navendu akramigalagiralilla
idannu (kur‌an‌annu) taruvavaru saitanaralla
avaru adakke ar'haru alla mattu adu avarige sadhyavu illa
idannu keladante avarannu tadeyalagide
allahana jotege bere yava devarannu prarthisabedi. An'yatha nivu siksegolagaguviri
nivu nim'ma hattirada bandhugalannu (modalu) eccarisiri
mattu nambike ittavara paiki nim'mannu anusarisuvavara palige nivu visesa vinaya ullavaragiri
innu avaru nimage avidheyaradare, nim'ma karmagalige nanu honeyalla endu helibidiri
(dutare,) nivu a prabalanada karunamayiyalli bharavase idiri
avanu nim'mannu kanuttiruttane, nivu nintiruvaga
Mattu sastangaveraguvavara (namajh sallisuvavara) jotege nivu tirugaduttiruvaga (avanu nim'mannu kanuttiruttane)
avanu khandita ellavannu keluvavanu ballavanu agiddane
saitananu yara balige ilidu baruttarendu nanu nimage tilisale
sullaropagalannu horisuva pratiyobba papiya balige avaru ilidu baruttare
avaru, avarige vadantigalannu talupisuttare mattu avugalalli heccinavu sullagiruttave
mattu kavigalannu darigettavaru matra anusarisuttare
nivu kanuttillave, avaru (kavigalu) pratiyondu kaniveyallu aleyuvudannu
mattu avaru tavu madilladdannu heluttiruvudannu

satyavannu nambidavaru mattu satkarmigalu idakke horatagiruttare. Avaru pade pade allahanannu smarisuttiruttare mattu tam'ma mele an'yayavada balikavaste adakke pratikaravesaguttare. An'yaya esagidavaru, tam'mannu entaha nelege maralisalaguvudu embudannu ariyaliddare
tva sin. Ivu kur‌anina mattu bahala spastavagiruva granthada vacanagalu
nambuvavara palige margadarsana hagu subhavarte idarallide
avaru namajhannu palisuvavaru, jhakatannu pavatisuvavaru mattu paralokadalli nambike ullavaragiruttare
navu, paralokavannu nambadavara palige, avara karmagalannu khandita, candaganisi bittiddeve. Addarinda avaru kurudagi aleyuttale iruttare
